Gracias por hacer posible La Brújula: Thank you for making La Brújula possible
landing: Download La Brújula in PDF to use it offline
heroTitle: La Brújula.<1></1> Network of the audiovisual and film industry in Mexico.
landingParagraph: For 14 years, we have been dedicated to bringing together people, companies, and institutions from the audiovisual and film industry in Mexico so that you can find them in one place.<1></1><2>At La Brújula, we keep building!</2>
contactCTA: Contact the person, company, or institution you need for your project
